I never thought it would turn out like this...!\""},{"lineNumber":31298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　せめて……向こうが気づいてくれれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If only... they would notice it on their side...\""},{"lineNumber":31299,"originalJapaneseLine":"絶望の表情で、ウルザとアールコートは","translatedEnglishLine":"With look of despair, Urza and Arlcourt"},{"lineNumber":31300,"originalJapaneseLine":"出撃していった先を見つめていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"gazed at the place where they had gone out to battle."},{"lineNumber":31301,"originalJapaneseLine":"地底を、ブレイブ号が進んでいく。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Brave Ship advanced through the underground."},{"lineNumber":31302,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブレイブ号、内部――――","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the Brave Ship――――"},{"lineNumber":31303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「深度固定、90メートル。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Depth fixed at 90 meters."},{"lineNumber":31304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このまま、魔物の森まで一直線で行くよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll go straight to the Monster Forest from here.\""},{"lineNumber":31305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむうむ、よしよし。楽なもんだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes, good good. This is easy."},{"lineNumber":31306,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初からこうすれば良かったか、がはははは」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe we should have done this from the start, hahaha.\""},{"lineNumber":31307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「途中で、たぶん地底のモンスターに遭遇すると","translatedEnglishLine":"\"On the way, we'll probably encounter some underground monsters,"},{"lineNumber":31308,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思うけれど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think...\""},{"lineNumber":31309,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなもん、俺様が片付けてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That kind of thing, I'll take care of it."},{"lineNumber":31310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　楽勝だ、楽勝」","translatedEnglishLine":"Easy win, easy win.\""},{"lineNumber":31311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「頼もしいね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Reliable, isn't it."},{"lineNumber":31312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……機関安定。よし、いいぞ、ブレイブ号……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Engine stable. Good, well done, Brave Ship...\""},{"lineNumber":31313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はああぁぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaaahhh..."},{"lineNumber":31314,"originalJapaneseLine":"　東芝様、輝いているでち……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Toshiba-sama is shining...\""},{"lineNumber":31315,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガリゴリと、振動と共にブレイブ号は進む。","translatedEnglishLine":"With grinding noise and vibrations, the Brave Ship moved forward."},{"lineNumber":31316,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこかのんびりとした空気のまま、","translatedEnglishLine":"Amid an air of calm and ease,"},{"lineNumber":31317,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類の希望たちは進んでいった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the hopes of humanity proceeded forward."},{"lineNumber":31318,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブレイブ号が進行して、半日ほど。","translatedEnglishLine":"After about half a day of the Brave Ship's progress."},{"lineNumber":31319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様、お食事です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance, here is your meal.\""},{"lineNumber":31320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？　メシの時間か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? Is it meal time?\""},{"lineNumber":31321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。外がこうですから分かりませんけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. Since it's like this outside, you might not realize, but"},{"lineNumber":31322,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時間的にはもう夜ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's already nighttime by time.\""},{"lineNumber":31323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……なるほどそうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... I see."},{"lineNumber":31324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よし、メシをもてい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, bring the food.\""},{"lineNumber":31325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい、ごはんだよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay, it's mealtime!\""},{"lineNumber":31326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、美樹ちゃん？　来てたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Miki-chan? You came.\""},{"lineNumber":31327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん。地底なら魔軍も来ないし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. The demon army won't come underground,"},{"lineNumber":31328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちの方が安全だー、って言われて」","translatedEnglishLine":"so they said this place is safer.\""},{"lineNumber":31329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス君が危ない所に行くのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since Rance-kun is going somewhere dangerous..."},{"lineNumber":31330,"originalJapaneseLine":"　離れたままとか、いやだし……えへへ","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't want to be apart from him... ehehe.\""},{"lineNumber":31331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむうむ、そうかそうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm hmm, I see, I see."},{"lineNumber":31332,"originalJapaneseLine":"　美樹ちゃんは可愛いな、がははは」","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki-chan is cute, hahaha.\""},{"lineNumber":31333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しまった……この地底だと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn... down here underground,"},{"lineNumber":31334,"originalJapaneseLine":"　新しい新聞を調達できないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't get a new newspaper."},{"lineNumber":31335,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うーん、うーん、ついに自作に手を出すか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, hmm, looks like I'll have to make one myself after all...\""},{"lineNumber":31336,"originalJapaneseLine":"（結局、今まで美樹さんの記憶は","translatedEnglishLine":"(After all, Miki-san's memories have"},{"lineNumber":31337,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おかしくなったままなんですよね……）","translatedEnglishLine":"remained strange until now...)\""},{"lineNumber":31338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、健太郎くんにも、はい、ごはん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Kentarou-kun, here's your meal too.\""},{"lineNumber":31339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、ありがとう美樹ちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, thank you, Miki-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":31340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この計画書……妙な所があって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This project proposal... it has something strange about it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認を取っていたのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was checking just to be sure...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てください、これ……！」
「え……………ええぇぇえっ……
ほ、本当……ですか……！？
「まずい……こんな事に、なるなんて……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is bad... I never thought it would turn out like this...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて……向こうが気づいてくれれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If only... they would notice it on their side..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶望の表情で、ウルザとアールコートは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With look of despair, Urza and Arlcourt

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出撃していった先を見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gazed at the place where they had gone out to battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地底を、ブレイブ号が進んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Brave Ship advanced through the underground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブレイブ号、内部――――
「深度固定、90メートル。
このまま、魔物の森まで一直線で行くよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll go straight to the Monster Forest from here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむうむ、よしよし。楽なもんだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes, good good. This is easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初からこうすれば良かったか、がはははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe we should have done this from the start, hahaha."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「途中で、たぶん地底のモンスターに遭遇すると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On the way, we'll probably encounter some underground monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思うけれど……」
「そんなもん、俺様が片付けてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That kind of thing, I'll take care of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽勝だ、楽勝」
「頼もしいね。
……機関安定。よし、いいぞ、ブレイブ号……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Engine stable. Good, well done, Brave Ship..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はああぁぁ……
東芝様、輝いているでち……」
ガリゴリと、振動と共にブレイブ号は進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With grinding noise and vibrations, the Brave Ship moved forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかのんびりとした空気のまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amid an air of calm and ease,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の希望たちは進んでいった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the hopes of humanity proceeded forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブレイブ号が進行して、半日ほど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After about half a day of the Brave Ship's progress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、お食事です」
「あん？　メシの時間か？」
「はい。外がこうですから分かりませんけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Since it's like this outside, you might not realize, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間的にはもう夜ですよ」
「む……なるほどそうか。
よし、メシをもてい」
「はーい、ごはんだよー」
「お、美樹ちゃん？　来てたのか」
「うん。地底なら魔軍も来ないし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. The demon army won't come underground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちの方が安全だー、って言われて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so they said this place is safer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス君が危ない所に行くのに……
離れたままとか、いやだし……えへへ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't want to be apart from him... ehehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむうむ、そうかそうか。
美樹ちゃんは可愛いな、がははは」
「しまった……この地底だと
新しい新聞を調達できないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't get a new newspaper.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、うーん、ついに自作に手を出すか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, hmm, looks like I'll have to make one myself after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （結局、今まで美樹さんの記憶は
おかしくなったままなんですよね……）
「あ、健太郎くんにも、はい、ごはん」
「うん、ありがとう美樹ちゃん」
「けっ！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認を取っていたのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was checking just to be sure...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てください、これ……！」
「え……………ええぇぇえっ……
ほ、本当……ですか……！？
「まずい……こんな事に、なるなんて……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is bad... I never thought it would turn out like this...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて……向こうが気づいてくれれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If only... they would notice it on their side..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes, good good. This is easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初からこうすれば良かったか、がはははは」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思うけれど……」
「そんなもん、俺様が片付けてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That kind of thing, I'll take care of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽勝だ、楽勝」
「頼もしいね。
……機関安定。よし、いいぞ、ブレイブ号……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Engine stable. Good, well done, Brave Ship..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はああぁぁ……
東芝様、輝いているでち……」
ガリゴリと、振動と共にブレイブ号は進む。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amid an air of calm and ease,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the hopes of humanity proceeded forward.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Since it's like this outside, you might not realize, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間的にはもう夜ですよ」
「む……なるほどそうか。
よし、メシをもてい」
「はーい、ごはんだよー」

「うん。地底なら魔軍も来ないし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. The demon army won't come underground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちの方が安全だー、って言われて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so they said this place is safer."

離れたままとか、いやだし……えへへ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't want to be apart from him... ehehe."

新しい新聞を調達できないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't get a new newspaper.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、うーん、ついに自作に手を出すか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, hmm, looks like I'll have to make one myself after all..."

おかしくなったままなんですよね……）

「うん、ありがとう美樹ちゃん」
「けっ！」
